field.value.description: The token value of the credential

field.createdAt.description: The time when the credential was created

field.expiredAt.description: The time when the credential will be expired

field.usedAt.description: The time when the credential was used

field.expiration.description: The time when the credential will be expired

field.application.description: The application that the credential belongs to

field.service.description: The service that the credential is used for

field.setLimitation.description: Set the limitation of the credential

field.setExpiration.description: Set the expiration time of the credential

field.usedAmount.description: The amount of the credential that has been used

message.confirmDelete.message: Are you sure you want to delete?
message.confirmDelete.description: Confirm whether to delete the credential

message.introduction.message: The credential is the key to access the service. You can create a credential by clicking the "Create" button. You can also view the details of the credential by clicking the "View" button.

message.createFailed.description: The credential failed to be created

message.maxLimitation.description: The maximum limitation you can set
